questions.question: 1. ________ technique is using to study current - spike frequency relationship in order to understand membrane properties.

answers.c: Both Voltage clamp and Current clamp

questions.question: 2. Latency - current graph plots ______ on x-axis and _______ on y-axis.
3. When the amplitude of injected current is increases as response from the cell, a) the first spike latency increases and  b) the number of spikes increases.
